attributes.action:
Stop Jeremy Corbyn becoming 
 prime minister if Johnson loses confidence vote.
attributes.background: Opposition parties are trying to put through a vote of no confidence against Boris Johnson to thwart Brexit. We need to stop Jeremy Corbyn getting in Number 10 as an unelected PM.

rejection.details: We can't accept petitions about honours or appointments, which includes petitions calling for someone to get, or not to get, a job.
